original_text: It was not your children who saw what he did for you in the wilderness until you arrived at this place,
korean_text: 또 너희가 이 곳에 이르기까지 광야에서 너희에게 행하신 일과

sentences.original_text: who saw what he did for you
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 당신을 위해 한 일을 본 사람은

sentences.original_text: until you arrived at this place
